column4: hey there, how do i add an item to the menu in ubuntu 11.04 ?
no, the thing which comes up when i hit the 'windows key' - i've got bacula bat installed, but there's no menu item... so i need to manually create one
thats dash (i think) you could make a proper whatever.desktop entry for the program and put it with the other system desktop files.
try running the monitors config tool?
doesn't help. the screen flashes once with the picture that should be there and then goes black again...
